title: Justin Bieber wants to go on double date with Cody Simpson and Miley Cyrus
text:

Justin Bieber has sent Instagram into meltdown as he reignited his friendship with fellow pop star Cody Simpson, who is currently dating former Disney star Miley Cyrus .

The Canadian hitmaker, 25, randomly commented on the Australian teen sensation's latest snap on Wednesday.

Cody, 22, shared the hunky black-and-white photo of himself flaunting his toned physique and enviable six-pack a few days ago.

A few days later, newly married Justin spotted the semi-naked snap and posted his response.

(Image: Instagram)

Justin joked: "Ur body is a wonderland."

The star then commented again with a suggestion: "Double date?"

Bieber's "Double date?" idea was met with a reply from Simpson, "Text Me."

(Image: Instagram)

The Baby hitmaker has been giving fans a look at his glittering wedding ceremony which took place in South Carolina last week.

Justin tied the knot to his model fiancé Hailey and most recently, shared an unseen sultry snap as he took off the bride's garter with his teeth.

Miley and her new beau Cody may not have been at the star-studded Bieber wedding but the Bangers singer was recently checked into hospital after falling ill with tonsillitis.

Happy couple Justin and Hailey exchanged vows in front of 154 A-list guests including Kendall and Kylie Jenner , Jaden Smith and Ed Sheeran .

(Image: Instagram)

The pair were married in a legal ceremony last September in a courtroom in New York City. Yet the lovebirds spared no expensive with their lavish wedding ceremony in South Carolina with $50 wedding gifts, personalised champagne bottles and spa treatments.

Bieber's double date suggestion with Cody and Miley comes after the pair revealed they have been dating for a few weeks with Miley even referring to him as her 'boyfriend.'

Miley seems smitten with the new man in her life as she admitted she felt the 'luckiest' to have him by her side as she recovered from her throat infection.

(Image: Instagram)

Miley's latest whirlwind relationship appears to be getting serious.

The singer spoke out about their 'make out sessions' last week and said Cody was just 'her type.'

The loved-up pair have been all over each other since being spotted kissing.

Miley's public display with her new beau comes after she was seen dating Kaitlynn Carter last month following her recent split from husband Liam Hemsworth after one year of marriage.

We would love to see this foursome enjoy a star-studded double date. Looks like it's time to finalise those date plans.
description: The newly-married singing sensation sends fans wild as he teases double date plans with new couple Cody Simpson and Miley Cyrus
